name: Abyssey
summary:
Abyssey is a strategy log-like game with Pixel Horizontal Scroll View!
Get jewelry and get a job! You get one job depending on the jewelry you're wearing!
Depending on your job, you will be able to use your own basic attacks and skills!
There are a total of 16 jobs, and you can experience new plays every time!
You can also gain item synergies, and item synergies can earn additional skills and stats to complement your job skills!
You can strengthen your items to make your current skills and synergy stronger!
There are more than 60 items. Try combine them in a variety of ways!
And, Beat enemies and bosses by creating my own synergy combination!
